checkClassExtends

public static boolean checkClassExtends(oracle.jbo.dt.objects.JboApplication app,
                                        java.lang.String classNameExpected,
                                        java.lang.String className)
Utility method to use JOT Framework for class extension. This is used instead of reflection or java Class methods because it does not need the class to be in the current classpath.

Parameters:
app - to add to.
classNameExpected - to add
className - to check.
